Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-34062 affecting package python-tqdm for versions less than 4.66.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-34062 affecting package python-tqdm for versions less than 4.66.2-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-tqdm is earlier than 4.66.2-2, affected by CVE-2024-34062
